properties.Name: SetOfFinancialStatements
properties.Description:
Financial statements provide a format for the reporting of accounting information.

A set of financial statements will vary depending on the accounting guideline that the organization is following.

Columns.Name: LegalEntityId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Legal Entity.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the set of financial statements is prepared.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the set of financial statements is prepared.

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementPreparationDate
Columns.Description: The date that the Financial Statement was prepared.

Columns.Name: AccountantsOpinionStatement
Columns.Description: A signed statement regarding the financial status of an entity from an independent public accountant after examination of that entities records and accounts.

Columns.Name: FinancialStatementDurationTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Accounting Period.

Columns.Name: PreparedByPartyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Party.
